The Council member opens a door, leading to a long hallway, cells line
both sides. As he walks down, the cells each have names engraved on
them, and filling cabinate like machines inside each one. In each of
these machines is stored a Great War Criminal. "This is where we got
you, the Stunticons, Astrotrain, and Spinister." The Predacon said. "We
have some old friends in mind to go with you.
